distSTRING 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

granthamMatrix

Source: R/granthamMatrix.R
granthamMatrix.Rd

This function creates a granthamMatrix object to be used with the distSTRING function. By default, the grantham matrix is defined as from Grantham 1974. (see https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00335-017-9704-9)

granthamMatrix()

References

Grantham R. (1974). Amino Acid Difference Formula to Help Explain Protein Evolution. Science, 185(4154), 862-864.

See also

aastring2dist, dist.dna

Author

Kristian K Ullrich

Examples

granthamMatrix()

#>     S   R   L   P   T   A   V   G   I   F   Y   C   H   Q   N   K   D   E   M
